snippet.title: Xuan-Yuan Sword: Mists Beyond the Mountains - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Xuan-Yuan Sword: Mists Beyond the Mountains is a pixel art RPG turn-based combat game developed by Softstar Entertainment. Players will be taken on a story where the East and West are in a time of collision covering a wide range, spanning Eurasia, the Arab World, Francia, and China. Explore a vast world, fight epic boss fights based on the Active Time Battle system, and engage in the unique crafting system. Xuan-Yuan Sword: Mists Beyond the Mountains launches on July 26 for PC with a release on Nintendo Switch later this year.
